summary: SARS Resources is an extremely useful practical website organized by members of the unfortunate group faced with containing the North American epicenter of the SARS outbreak. it provides materials that have been developed to assist health care providers in caring for patients with SARS. if the website remains current then it should prove to be a helpful resource for future outbreaks. centers for disease control and prevention http://www.cdc.gov/ncidod/sars/ World Health Organization http://www.who.int/csr/sars/en/ Health Canada http://www.hc-sc.gc.ca/pphb-dgspsp/sars-sras/index.html Competing interests None declared.
